birth_place.zh-cn: 河北省石家庄专区平山县

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党及中华人民共和国政治人物，原正国级领导人，曾任第十三届全国人大常委会委员长、中共中央政治局常委。
description.en: A Chinese politician, former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress and a member of the Politburo Standing Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会总书记，中华人民共和国主席，中央军事委员会主席。栗战书早年在河北任职时与其结识，后成为其最信任的心腹之一。
description.en: General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission. He became acquainted with Li Zhanshu when they were both serving in Hebei province in their early careers, and Li later became one of his most trusted confidants.

description.zh-cn: 曾任中国共产党中央委员会主席和总书记。1982年，栗战书曾致信于他，建议全国人民高唱《社会主义好》，该信后被批转并在《人民日报》发表。
description.en: Former Chairman and General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China. In 1982, Li Zhanshu wrote a letter to him suggesting that the song 'Socialism is Good' be promoted nationwide, a letter which was later approved and published in the People's Daily.

description.zh-cn: 原中共河北省委书记。栗战书因与其秘书李真产生矛盾而遭到边缘化。
description.en: Former Secretary of the CPC Hebei Provincial Committee. Li Zhanshu was sidelined due to a conflict with his secretary, Li Zhen.

nodes.id: 李真 (河北省国税局局长)

zh-cn: 李真 (河北省国税局局长)

description.zh-cn: 时任河北省委书记程维高的秘书。栗战书与其产生矛盾后被调离权力中心。
description.en: Secretary to Cheng Weigao, then Party Secretary of Hebei. Li Zhanshu was transferred away from the center of power after a conflict with him.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书的妻子。
description.en: Spouse of Li Zhanshu.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书的女儿，现任建银国际（控股）有限公司董事长。
description.en: Daughter of Li Zhanshu, currently the chairwoman of CCB International (Holdings) Limited.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书的女婿，栗潜心的丈夫，持有新加坡护照。
description.en: Son-in-law of Li Zhanshu and husband of Li Qianxin, holds a Singaporean passport.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书的叔叔，曾任中国人民解放军第一野战军营长，在扶郿战役中阵亡。
description.en: Uncle of Li Zhanshu, served as a battalion commander in the First Field Army of the People's Liberation Army and was killed in the Fumei Campaign.

description.zh-cn: 中国国共内战期间的一场战役，栗战书的叔叔栗政通在此战役中阵亡。
description.en: A campaign during the Chinese Civil War in which Li Zhanshu's uncle, Li Zhengtong, was killed.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 一部由全国人大常委会在栗战书主持下制定并通过的涉及香港的国家安全法律。
description.en: A national security law concerning Hong Kong, enacted and passed by the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress under the chairmanship of Li Zhanshu.

nodes.id: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
十三届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 13th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第十三届全国人民代表大会的常设机关，栗战书在此期间担任委员长。该届常委会废除了收容教育制度并通过了香港国安法。
description.en: The permanent body of the 13th National People's Congress, with Li Zhanshu serving as its chairman. This committee abolished the re-education system and passed the Hong Kong National Security Law.

description.zh-cn: 一项已废止的中华人民共和国法律制度，由栗战书执掌下的十三届全国人大常委会于2019年12月28日废除。
description.en: A defunct legal system in the People's Republic of China, which was abolished on December 28, 2019, by the 13th NPCSC under the leadership of Li Zhanshu.

description.zh-cn: 欧亚大陆北部的联邦共和国。栗战书在2022年访问该国时，表达了中国对其在乌克兰战争中立场的理解和策应。
description.en: A federal republic in northern Eurasia. During his visit in 2022, Li Zhanshu expressed China's understanding and support for Russia's position in the Ukraine war.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国前高级官员，栗战书的前任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Former senior official of the CCP and PRC, predecessor of Li Zhanshu as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee.

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会办公厅
en: General Office of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的办事机构。栗战书于2012年至2017年担任该机构主任。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Committee of the CPC. Li Zhanshu served as its director from 2012 to 2017.

description.zh-cn: 河北省石家庄市下辖县。栗战书曾在此担任县委书记，当时习近平在邻近的正定县任职。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Shijiazhuang, Hebei province. Li Zhanshu served as its Party Secretary while Xi Jinping was serving in the neighboring Zhengding County.

description.zh-cn: 河北省石家庄市下辖县。习近平曾在此担任县委书记，当时栗战书在邻近的无极县任职。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Shijiazhuang, Hebei province. Xi Jinping served as its Party Secretary while Li Zhanshu was serving in the neighboring Wuji County.

description.zh-cn: 一首中华人民共和国的政治歌曲。1982年，栗战书致信胡耀邦建议高唱此歌，并提议修改歌词。
description.en: A political song from the People's Republic of China. In 1982, Li Zhanshu wrote to Hu Yaobang suggesting this song be promoted and proposed a lyric change.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。栗战书于1975年4月加入该党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China. Li Zhanshu joined the party in April 1975.

description.zh-cn: 位于河北省石家庄市的一所大学。栗战书曾就读于该校夜校政教系。
description.en: A university located in Shijiazhuang, Hebei province. Li Zhanshu studied in the political education department of its night school.

nodes.id: 中国社会科学院研究生院

zh-cn: 中国社会科学院研究生院
en: Graduate School of Chinese Academy of Social Sciences

description.zh-cn: 中国社会科学院的研究生培养机构。栗战书在此修有在职研究生学历。
description.en: The graduate education institution of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences. Li Zhanshu obtained an in-service postgraduate qualification from here.

description.zh-cn: 位于黑龙江省哈尔滨市的一所大学。栗战书在此获得高级工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: A university located in Harbin, Heilongjiang province. Li Zhanshu obtained an Executive Master of Business Administration degree here.

description.zh-cn: 河北省石家庄市下辖县，栗战书的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Shijiazhuang, Hebei province, and the birthplace of Li Zhanshu.

description.zh-cn: 王凤霞是栗战书的妻子。
description.en: Wang Fengxia is the spouse of Li Zhanshu.

description.zh-cn: 栗潜心是栗战书的女儿。
description.en: Li Qianxin is the daughter of Li Zhanshu.

description.zh-cn: 蔡华波是栗潜心的丈夫，即栗战书的女婿。
description.en: Cai Huabo is the husband of Li Qianxin, making him the son-in-law of Li Zhanshu.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书的叔叔栗政通在1949年的扶郿战役中阵亡。
description.en: Li Zhanshu's uncle, Li Zhengtong, was killed in action during the Fumei Campaign in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书于1975年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Li Zhanshu joined the Communist Party of China in April 1975.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书于1980年10月进入河北师范大学夜校政教系学习。
description.en: Li Zhanshu began studying in the political education department of the night school at Hebei Normal University in October 1980.

relationships.target: 中国社会科学院研究生院

description.zh-cn: 栗战书在中国社会科学院研究生院获得在职研究生学历。
description.en: Li Zhanshu obtained an in-service postgraduate qualification from the Graduate School of the Chinese Academy of Social Sciences.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书在哈尔滨工业大学获得高级工商管理硕士学位。
description.en: Li Zhanshu obtained an Executive Master of Business Administration (EMBA) degree from Harbin Institute of Technology.

description.zh-cn: 1983年，时任无极县委书记的栗战书与邻近的正定县县委书记习近平相识并建立良好关系，后被视为习近平最信任的心腹之一。
description.en: In 1983, Li Zhanshu, then Party Secretary of Wuji County, became acquainted with Xi Jinping, Party Secretary of the neighboring Zhengding County, and established a good relationship. He was later regarded as one of Xi Jinping's most trusted confidants.

relationships.target: 李真 (河北省国税局局长)

description.zh-cn: 栗战书与时任河北省委书记程维高的秘书李真产生矛盾，导致其在1997年12月被调任边缘职务。
description.en: Li Zhanshu had a conflict with Li Zhen, secretary to then-Hebei Party Secretary Cheng Weigao, which led to Li being transferred to a marginal post in December 1997.

description.zh-cn: 1982年，时任中共中央主席的胡耀邦批转了栗战书建议高唱《社会主义好》的信件，该信件随后在《人民日报》发表，使栗战书名声大增。
description.en: In 1982, then-CPC Chairman Hu Yaobang approved Li Zhanshu's letter suggesting the promotion of the song 'Socialism is Good'. The letter was subsequently published in the People's Daily, greatly increasing Li's fame.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书接替令计划，担任中共中央办公厅主任。
description.en: Li Zhanshu succeeded Ling Jihua as Director of the General Office of the CPC Central Committee.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 由栗战书担任委员长的第十三届全国人大常委会于2019年12月28日通过决定，废止了收容教育制度。
description.en: On December 28, 2019, the 13th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress, chaired by Li Zhanshu, passed a decision to abolish the re-education system.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法

description.zh-cn: 在栗战书的主持下，第十三届全国人大常委会于2020年6月30日通过了《中华人民共和国香港特别行政区维护国家安全法》。
description.en: Under the chairmanship of Li Zhanshu, the 13th Standing Committee of the National People's Congress passed the Hong Kong National Security Law on June 30, 2020.

description.zh-cn: 2022年9月访问俄罗斯时，栗战书表示中方理解俄方为维护国家核心利益所采取的行动，并从不同方面给予“策应”。
description.en: During a visit to Russia in September 2022, Li Zhanshu stated that China understands the actions taken by Russia to safeguard its core national interests and provides 'coordination' from various aspects.

description.zh-cn: 栗战书于1950年出生于河北省平山县。
description.en: Li Zhanshu was born in Pingshan County, Hebei province, in 1950.
